title: Sparring Partners
description: Absolutely, positively no dating men at the office...!This policy has always worked just fine for Maggie, busy staff writer for a Vancouver city singles magazine. Or so she thought. Unfortunately for the lovely career woman, dating elsewhere doesn’t seem to be working out for her either.Infamous ladies’ man and resident office hottie, Jack Forrester, editor and Maggie’s boss, has had his eye on the feisty redhead for months, but she won’t give him the time of day. With an eye on the prize, Jack proposes a contest, pairing each of them with their ‘perfect dates.’ For five weeks Maggie and Jack double date with hilarious… and sometimes sticky results.Will Maggie play into Jack’s game or will his plan backfire and the woman of his dreams find her perfect man somewhere else?This is a clean, laugh-out-loud romantic comedy. For more updates on Marley Becket Ross you can visit her website at www.marleybeckettross.ca
author: Marley Beckett Ross
